title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin kicks off Monday's show taking a look at another report regarding Tom Brady's departure from the Patriots and why it appears there are 2 Brady's we've encountered over the years. He puts the pressure on the Pittsburgh Steelers and argues for rookie quarterback Kenny Pickett to be the week 1 starter. He tells you why he was right about Lamar Jackson and wrong about Kevin Durant. Plus, former Vikings general manager Rick Spielman joins the show to tell Colin how the Steelers should handle the Pickett situation and what it's like negotiating with superstar QBs like Lamar Jackson. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
